source.c89b38e9:
# creating dataframe which will include the information we need

info_names_genres = main_data.groupby(['Genre', 'Name']).sum().reset_index().groupby('Genre')

the_most_salable_games = pd.DataFrame()

for name, group in info_names_genres:
    column = group.sort_values('Global_Sales', ascending=False).head(3).Name.reset_index(drop=True)
    the_most_salable_games[name] = column

the_most_salable_games.head(3)
source.4079eddb:
# size
plt.figure(figsize=(18, 4))

# correlation
data_correlation = main_data.corr()

sns.heatmap(data_correlation, xticklabels = data_correlation.columns.values, yticklabels = data_correlation.columns.values, annot = True, cmap = "Greens")
